title: 鹅卵石漏水.
author: Jakob.z
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Jakob.z 于 2011-9-23 10:06 编辑 

1.9鹅卵石上面有水的话,下面会有水滴下来,只是还没加音效..土也会漏哦....错了,好多方块上面月水,下面都会漏....

replies.author: 幸福君
replies.txt_content: 我擦，更加真实了。

replies.author: Hostolor
replies.txt_content: 侧漏，侧漏。。。。

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 嗯... 不知道有哪些方塊不漏水的...

replies.author: hsf1357
replies.txt_content: 跑冒滴漏？呃呃呃...要伤身体滴。

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 好多bug  还是故意的？

replies.author: xdoncy
replies.txt_content: 漏水不是BUG 是符合現實的!

replies.author: ggyyxx
replies.txt_content:
Hostolor 发表于 2011-9-23 10:43 
侧漏，侧漏。。。。
以后要加护垫了

replies.author: luojuntom
replies.txt_content: 霸气侧漏。。。。

replies.author: Jakob.z
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Jakob.z 于 2011-9-23 13:52 编辑 
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-23 11:23 
好多bug  还是故意的？
PNG里已有水滴材质.



玻璃都会漏噢....这玻璃工艺做的,那看来只要方块上面有水的话,下南都会有水滴下来.无论任何方块,

replies.author: aizuo
replies.txt_content: 这个好啊，以后就不会井下灌水了……

replies.author: ImnotSteve
replies.txt_content: 竟然会漏水了

replies.author: gb3327
replies.txt_content: 石磚呢，石頭燒成的那種?

replies.author: gb3327
replies.txt_content: 石磚呢，石頭燒成的那種?

replies.author: jimmylyb
replies.txt_content: 岩浆也会漏啊……你们没发现？

replies.author: stalincenlam
replies.txt_content: 什么都会漏。。。
玻璃总不会漏吧

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content: 唉...都漏...沒地方躲雨了= =

replies.author: lituo841019
replies.txt_content: 漏的心烦.10字补丁.exe

replies.author: WDWDDWWDWD
replies.txt_content: 害我電腦顯卡快被JJ怪擁抱了==
